introduction: Renata, a young and talented swimmer, has a secret relationship with Liliana (her strict, older swim coach). When the state competition approaches, the line between love and abuse becomes more blurry. Renata's place in the competition is jeopardized by her and Liliana’s dark game of power. When the blinding veil of adolescent passion leaves Renata's eyes, she understands that inside the pool is not the only place where one can feel short of breath.源自：https://programa.giff.mx/eng/2023/pelicula/1953
